preconditions: Banking system test environment is fully operational and accessible
Test user accounts with appropriate permissions are created and verified
Account Management System is deployed and configured correctly in test environment
Test data for Account Management is prepared and validated in test database
Network connectivity between test client and banking system is stable

test_steps.step_description: Navigate to banking system login page
test_steps.detailed_action: Open web browser and navigate to banking system URL
test_steps.expected_output: Login page should be displayed with username and password fields

test_steps.detailed_action: Type valid username in the username field
test_steps.expected_output: Username should be entered and displayed in the field

test_steps.detailed_action: Type valid password in the password field
test_steps.expected_output: Password should be entered and masked in the field

test_steps.detailed_action: Click the login button to submit credentials
test_steps.expected_output: User should be authenticated and redirected to dashboard

test_steps.detailed_action: Click on Accounts menu from main navigation
test_steps.expected_output: Account management page should be displayed with account options

test_steps.step_description: Click on Create New Account option
test_steps.detailed_action: Select Create New Account from account options
test_steps.navigation_path: Accounts -> Account Management -> Create New Account
test_steps.expected_output: New account creation form should be displayed

test_steps.detailed_action: Type customer's first name in the first name field
test_steps.navigation_path: Create Account Form -> Customer Details -> First Name Field
test_steps.expected_output: First name should be accepted and displayed in the field

test_steps.detailed_action: Type customer's last name in the last name field
test_steps.navigation_path: Create Account Form -> Customer Details -> Last Name Field
test_steps.expected_output: Last name should be accepted and displayed in the field

test_steps.detailed_action: Choose account type from the available options
test_steps.navigation_path: Create Account Form -> Account Details -> Account Type Dropdown
test_steps.expected_output: Account type should be selected and displayed in dropdown

test_steps.detailed_action: Type the initial deposit amount in the deposit field
test_steps.navigation_path: Create Account Form -> Account Details -> Initial Deposit Field
test_steps.expected_output: Deposit amount should be accepted and formatted correctly

test_steps.detailed_action: Click the Create Account button to submit the form
test_steps.expected_output: Account should be created successfully with confirmation message

test_steps.detailed_action: Click logout button to end the session securely
test_steps.expected_output: User should be logged out and redirected to login page

expected_result: Account Management should complete successfully with all validations passed
detailed_expected_output:
Account Management functionality in Account Management System should execute successfully with the following outcomes:

1. Functional Validation:
   - All business operations complete without errors or exceptions
   - Data processing achieves 100% accuracy with proper validation
   - User interface elements respond correctly within acceptable timeframes

2. Navigation and User Experience:
   - All navigation paths work correctly and lead to expected pages
   - Form fields accept valid input and reject invalid input appropriately
   - Error messages are clear, actionable, and user-friendly

3. Data Validation and Processing:
   - All input data is validated according to business rules
   - Data transformations are accurate and complete
   - Database transactions maintain ACID properties
notes: Detailed test case for Account Management with comprehensive navigation and data validation
